Package com.heslington_hustle.game

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heslington_hustle.game.Stats
  • public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    The Stats class represents the statistics of the game, including activities performed, study sessions, and daily progress. It provides methods to log activity, retrieve statistics, manage daily progress, and reset statistics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Stats()
      Constructs a Stats object and initializes its variables.
